description.full: Defy fate! Hades has unleashed his minions, and you must conquer all or be conquered in this epic war of the gods. Relive the adventures of Perseus as you battle through a vast mythical underworld with over 100 different enemies. Based on the film, CLASH OF THE TITANS THE VIDEOGAME goes beyond the script to give you additional quests, weapons, and enemies. You can acquire and use your enemies' weapons to grow stronger as you defeat them. * Multiple Modes of Play: The storyline follows the film with additional new adventures beyond the movie. * Downloadable content includes: Bonus quests, enhanced skills, and custom items. Exciting downloadable content will be released to enhance gameplay and weaponry. * Over 100 mythological enemies to battle. * 15 vast mythological environments to explore and conquer. * Over 80 customizable weapons for Perseus to equip as he goes into battle. * Fast-paced, action packed Gameplay: "Steal your enemies' weapons to power yourself up!"
